name: Snap Surveys
tag_list: survey-software, online-survey-software, paper-survey-software, mobile-survey-software, online-surveys, paper-surveys, mobile-surveys
overview:
Formed in 1981, Snap Surveys has established itself as one of the leading specialists in the processing of research surveys. The company is privately owned and funded by its directors and has offices in Bristol and London, England, and Portsmouth, NH, USA.

Snap Surveys is the author of Snap Survey Software. Snap Survey Software is a suite of integrated software programs for questionnaire design, publication, data collection and analysis. It consists of a core product, Snap Professional, and specialist modules that may be added to extend the capabilities to mobile phones, PDAs, Kiosks, Tablet PC’s, Scanning and Telephone Interviewing. The latest version, Snap 10, contains hundreds of improvements and new features for all types of survey.

The software is used daily by thousands of organizations of every size ranging from government departments, local authorities, higher education, market research agencies, financial services through to those involved in media, health and charities. Snap Survey Software runs under all variants of Windows, and import/export facilities are available to transfer data to and from other standard office software.

Snap Surveys is constantly improving and updating Snap and is taking an active role in market research standards, like the survey inter-change standard Triple-S.

The Snap Professional Edition is a stand alone software package incorporating paper, phone, e-mail and web surveys. With Snap Professional you can design and publish your questionnaire, enter data and analyze results using tables and charts. Snap also provides the ability to read and update MS Access and SQL database tables (e.g. Oracle, MS SQL Server, etc.) and is compliant with the Section 508 Access Boards standards and the W3C Web Accessibility Guidelines. You can print paper questionnaires for postal or face-to-face interviews or conduct telephone, e-mail or web-based surveys.

offices.address1: Pease International Tradeport One New Hampshire Ave

milestones.description: Snap Surveys celebrates 30 years in survey research,  survey software software, and feedback management solutions.
